name: Gladiator Simulator
description:
Travel back to the time some centuries back and play a fighter gladiator, a gladiator have to fight for his life, has survive the savages, the beasts unleashed by royal, kings, royal happens to setup this fights to watch as pleasure. Their please but a gladiator's life in in stakes. Dont be discourages, fight back, kill those savages and claim your freedom.

Mideaval gladiator arena
people wathcing while you fight for survival
fight till you win
freedom is precious, fight to achieve it.
never loose hope


This game supports ads
